strings.string: Select if you wish to LOGIN to a XinBox Account. If no accounts have been created, then you must CREATE an XinBox Account before logging in.
Select if you wish to CREATE a new XinBox Account. A XinBox account is required to LOGIN.
Select if you wish to CHANGE the XinBox settings.
Select if you wish to find out ABOUT the XinBox script.
Select if you wish to EXIT the XinBox script and return to XBMC.
Select to set the Account Name for your XinBox Account.
Select to set the Account Password for your XinBox Account. Select "No Password" to disable a password for this account.
Select to toggle if this Account is the Default Account. A Default Account automatically logs in on XinBox start-up. Note: There can only be a maximum of one Default Account.
Select to Add a new XinBox to this Account.
Select to Edit an existing XinBox in this Account.
Select to Delete an existing XinBox in this Account.
Select to return to the Main Menu.
